channel.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
channel.description:
I was wondering if i could get peoples opinion on whats better.On my birthday i might one of those chosen computers.Depends what i realy know about them right now,well to be honest i don't know much about Vista but alot about XP.My friends tell me this great news and information about Vista,but the only things they [b][i]REALY[/i][/b] say is ''Its great,get it''.Well how can somebody let that go to waste,so it would be very kind if you people can give me some advise on whats better.
Thank you for your time.

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:233474”][quote author=Zero187 link=topic=279668.msg2461589#msg2461589 date=1222498849]
lol xp > vista

win2k pro > xp (not anymore though, but back in the day when MS still supported 2k pro)
[/quote]

I honestly think MS is trying to kill off all XP users. All they have to do is stop releasing shitty updates that fuck up your computer.[/quote]It’s pretty obvious they do. They have always been using this technique to force people into upgrading. Guess why they have deals with big companies such as Dell and HP. With these deals, Microsoft forces people to upgrade hardware to run a newer system which results in these companies making more money because people are forced to buy new computers.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @slinkyman24 slinkyman24
item.description:
@slinkyman24 wrote:

Well it depends i have xp now and my computer is shit i have like 1 gig left on hard drive so its slow as balls and like when i go to my dads computer or somewhere else with vista i really like it fast download speeed great features and it’s just a little bit faster than xp in my point of view i have heard that it has problems but mostly people trash vista because of the label got a bad rep.

The Mojave experiment was pretty cool when they told them that there was a new operating system and everyone liked it but it was just vista. soo that proves that people just trash things for the label so i myself would go for a vista computer

Or my preference is a mac but ya kno lol

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Well i hate vista with a passion. I never have troubles with XP

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @srt8 srt8
item.description:
@srt8 wrote:

Kubuntu is what i’ve been using. I was forced to start using Linux because Windows was being super slow, and now I couldn’t imagine going back.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @reVein reVein
item.description:
@reVein wrote:

I have vista on this laptop, and since it’s 32-bit it takes 1gb off the 4gb ram by default, but to top all that, it takes another 1gb ram by running shitty processes.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Windows XP just because it has less bugs, and Vista takes up to much run time while gaming.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

I’ve always ever only used XP. Only because it’s never treated me bad. Vista has nothing exciting for me to upgrade except for DX10. The loss of ram, incompatible programs and unwanted visuals don’t impress me.

Read full topic

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista

item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

The internet is not a program - it’s a series of tubes.

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista
item.dc:creator: @Max_Is_No1 Max_Is_No1
item.description:
@Max_Is_No1 wrote:

XP without a doubt currently. My friend has Vista and without doing anything it takes 40% of the processor to run alone.

item.title: Windows XP Or Windows Vista

item.description:
@coaco260 wrote:

ive had xp for a while and no problems and i have vista for 1 month and it was so hard to run stuff and i was constantly like doin shit on it but withxp much faster and yea just stick with XP
